name: Climber (Cole Dunham)
description:
Avoid the lava while climbing in this endless platformer! Score more points by surviving, grabbing coins or defeating enemies!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows to move

Space/Left click to shoot

Made a quick game for my game programming class so I thought I'd share it here. Hope you like it!

Credits:

Most of it was done by me

Music and some audio was by Apo Koftekian

Thanks Andy, I finally reused your OnionGuy art!
